title: Vendor Onboarding
subtitle: Complete these steps to activate your vendor profile

steps.onboardDesc: Complete your initial vendor registration and provide business details
steps.stripeDesc: Set up your Stripe account to receive payments and manage transactions
steps.productsDesc: List the services or products you'll offer through the platform
steps.completeDesc: Your vendor profile is fully activated and ready to accept bookings

stripe.title: Stripe Connect Account Setup
stripe.description: Complete your Stripe account setup to enable payments and transactions.
stripe.exitedMessage: Stripe onboarding was exited. Would you like to resume?

products.title: Add Your First Product
products.description: Add your first product or service to start accepting bookings.

messages.submittedDesc: Your vendor application is under review. We'll notify you once it's processed.
messages.actionNeededDesc: Please review and address the following:

errors.title: Onboarding Error
errors.productsRequired: Please add at least one product
